column4: how do i install the gnome windowmanager in ubuntu miniman installation??
only the wm or whole gnome ?
look for others wm. metacity without gnome is pretty useless.
openbox windowmaker or fluxbox is a better choices for a standalone wm
give the exact command line you used
extended partition can not be formated afaik
if the disk is empty i recomend to redo the parition table
not all jobs are handled by upstart yet. which one are you talking about
add the hdd filesystems to the system via fstab
you have to add them before the "exit 0" so a echo >> wont do
